insights: Increasing reliance on indirect taxes adds to the burden on the common man. Increasing prices of the necessary goods and services worsens it. It is found that price of necessary goods like pulses has increased by 59.3 percent during January to December 2015.

Increasing reliance on indirect taxes adds to the burden on the common man. Increasing prices of the necessary goods and services worsens it. It is found that price of necessary goods like pulses has increased by 59.3 percent during January to December 2015.
